item.description:
After a long break it is time for some relaxation again! We will continue with the topic of mindfulness and learn how this ancient form of meditation can help us deal with life's ups and downs. This is a drop-in session (as opposed to the 8-week program, that I offer starting in April). Come to relax and meet others who share you interest in leading a more conscious and peaceful life.

We are meeting at Art & Soul Yoga Studio. For directions, please visit their website:

http://www.artsoulyoga.com/Art_%26_Soul/Home.html

As usual, please contribute $5, to help cover the costs of rental.

Hope to see you then!
item.name: Mindfulness Tools
